full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GDON BGEGS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR NAG PHYOGS PA'I 'KHON GNOD 'TSE SEL THABS BKRA SHIS GANG KHYIL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES GDON BGEGS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR NAG PHYOGS PA'I 'KHON GNOD 'TSE SEL THABS BKRA SHIS GANG KHYIL ZHES BYA BA, 'DI NYID RIGS RUS SHIN TU MTHO ZHING DAD DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA DZA ZAG AO LO SOD THU SHI GUNG PA THUR TAS CHEN BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS DANG, ,AA NING KHE KHA THUG THAS BTZUN MO BRTZON 'GRUS SA DANG, ,SRAS PA THUR TAS CHEN RDO RJE PHA LAM DANG, ,LHA BTZUN DAR RGYAS SOGS KYI SKU'I RIM 'GROR DMIGS NAS, ,RIGS 'DZIN TE DZA BADZRAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RANG GI GNAS PA'I SLOB BU 'PHRIN LAS STOBS LDAN GYIS BRIS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,  ,DGE'O, ,)
